name: Xenioo Web Chat
author: Matelab Srl

sections.description:
This plugin allows quick configuration of the Xenioo Web Chat Widget by using the simple parameters you can obtain from your account publish dialog.
Copy and paste the required Xenioo parameters and the Chatbot snippet will be automatically generated in your pages.

This plugin relies on the Xenioo chatbot platform for every chatbot functionality. Please make sure to check Xenioo main website at https://www.xenioo.com.
You can create a free Xenioo account starting here: https://app.xenioo.com/auth/signup.

Xenioo Terms Of Service
Xenioo Privacy Policy
